events.name: Azure Community June Meetup
events.description: Hi All, We will be having a special meetup on Azure. Have you ever experiencing website something like this? Find out how you may use Linux in Azure to easily resolve this. :) This time Terence will share with us on Virtual Private Network and Proxy Server in Azure Virtual Machine using Linux OS. You can also bring your own Laptop and follow Terence on how to create the VPN and Proxy server in Linux. We are also going to share some latest news on Azure as well. Many thanks for your support for the community. See you there. Prerequisites for Hands-on-workshop: 1) Download and install the OpenVPN Client: http://bit.ly/open_vpn_client 2) Download putty.exe: http://www.chiark.greenend.org.uk/~sgtatham/putty/download.html 3) Come with an Azure account. If you do not have one yet, you may sign up via this URL: http://bit.ly/azure_trial 4) Bring your own laptop. :)
events.location: 22CF12, Level 22, Microsoft Singapore, Singapore 018989, One Marina Boulevard

events.name: ArtScience Late
events.description: One Thursday a month, 7pm to 10pm [EVENT IS NOW FULL*] Chicks on Speed: The Art of Work Part 2 In collaboration with Malvina Tan, Dinu Bodiciu, Lennat Mak and Zul Mahmod Enjoy a drink at the bar from 7pm. Doors open at 8.15pm. Performance at 8.30pm Expression Gallery, Level 4 *Please note that you need to have registered via Eventbrite to get a ticket for entry to the performance. The allocation for this performance has now been fully used up and there are no further tickets available. Please ensure you have the print-out or soft copy confirmation with you on the night. Globetrotting performance, art, music, and new media collective Chicks on Speed take the stage this ArtScience Late with their special mix of irony and electronic beats. Merging video, choreography and fashion, they will be playing live against the backdrop of their surrealistic and poetic short films. Be prepared for an evening that will be visually stunning as well as sonically explosive. In partnership with NTU CCA Residencies Programme.

events.name: More And More People Are Making Money In Qoo10 - Are You Next?
events.description:
FREE Qoo10 Training In Singapore For A LIMITED Time 





  
More And More People Are Making  Money In Qoo10 - Are You Next? Or Are  You Going To Miss Out On This  Profitable Trend? 
        Register for your Free Qoo10 training where we show you how you can  easily set up a part-time online business with as little as 1 hour a day.    These People Have Already Achieve Success  By Using Our Simple 5 Step System!     




Do you want to be next?




Just In case you want to know what sells well online... here are some  of the case studies we will go through with you in our FREE training 
What Are The Top Selling Products In Qoo10 And  How To Take Full Advantage Of It! 











  




How David Created A 5 Figure Income From Scratch Just By Selling 1 Simple Product In  The First Month!    




  




What Is This Simple Strategy Jerry Applied That  Helped Him Sell More Than 1000 Pieces Of  Electronic Products!    




  




Is Hardwork The “Only” Way To Succeed In Life?  Obviously NOT!    It is about applying the right formula to short cut your way to success.  And that is exactly what Suat Li did.        She achieved all these within 6 months of applying our 5-steps system





  In Our Free Training You Will Also Get To Discover  A 5 Step System That's Sworn By Everyone! 
     





WARNING: This training is different from what you're used to. 
  In it, we will walk you through specific and actionable strategies that are working right now.    You will get to see the products that are selling like hot cakes and the type of promotion that we did to get 6 figure sales online.    This is the FRESHEST information on how to start an e-commence from the face of the Earth and you won't find this information anywhere else except through our training here.    If you want start a part-time business, quit your job or simply to earn more money, register for your training now. 





We have Limited Space In Our Office, So Register  Now Before Someone Else Snatches Your Seat    (It's FREE Anyway, So There Is Nothing  For You To Lose And More To Gain) 




Seats Are Extremely Limited
events.location: 452 North Bridge Rd, , Chan Brothers Building, #04-00, (Near Bugis Junction), Singapore 188733

events.name: HIKVISION CCTV Training (Singapore) -  June 2015 (Products/VMS)
events.description:
Hikvision Singapore Pte Ltd, has introduced classroom learning to help dealers and installers get up to speed on Hikvision video products. 
Three training modules catered to pre-sales and technical, which are available free to Hikvision customers, let them spend some time in Hikvision Singapore office to learn about the features built into the company’s cameras, DVRs and software. 
  
Agenda for this Training: 
2:30pm - 3:00pm Register/ Tea and Get-Know Session 
3:00pm-3:30pm   Introduction of Hikvision and range of Network Cameras by Hikvision (New) 
3:30-4pm)            Tea Break 
4:30pm- 6pm        Practical : ivms 4200/4500 Hands-On: "Adding Cameras and Finding your way in ivms 4200"  Product Demo iVMS 5200 
  
Hikvision is the world's largest supplier of video surveillance products and solutions. The company specializes in video surveillance technology, as well as designing and manufacturing a full-line of innovative CCTV and video surveillance products. The product line ranges from cameras and DVRs to video management software. Since its inception in 2001, Hikvision has quickly achieved a leading worldwide market position in the security industry. 
Hikvision possess the world's largest R&D team and state-of-art manufacturing facilities; both allow Hikvision’s customers the benefit of world-class products that are designed with cutting-edge technology. As further commitment to its customers, Hikvision annually reinvests 7% of its revenue into R&D for continued product innovation and improvement.
Hikvision operates over 30 domestic branches in China and 16 overseas regional subsidiaries all over the world to achieve a truly global presence. Hikvision is now publicly listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange.
Hikvision customers who wish to register their interest in taking advantage of the training modules or to find out more can do so by emailing: ryan.tan@hikvision.com or call 90027441.
events.location: HIKVISION SINGAPORE PTE LTD OFFICE, , 18 Sin Ming Ln,#08-07, MIDVIEW CITY, Singapore 573960
